name: Lunar Sea
description:
Made for  Lost Cartridge Jam 4

Target platform: NES

Lunar Sea

In the year 50xx, the earth has sunk in the oceans due to the impact of global warming.

It has been 12 years since a group of human survivors sailed the vast ocean and finally found a land with a mysterious building inside.

Muir, the captain of the ship in the group plans to enter the island for research and hopes that the island can become a new place to live for survivors.

Controls

This game using NES controller map.

moveD-PadArrowWASDJumpBZJTransformAXKStartstartEnterEnter
